content:
# The furnace has produced a total of 22 iron plates, but it is now reporting "no ingredients to smelt," indicating that it has run out of iron ore again.
# 
# Since I have 10 iron ore left in my inventory, I will insert some of that into the furnace to allow it to continue producing more iron plates.
# 
# I will insert 5 iron ore into the furnace to utilize its capacity.

# Inserting 5 iron ore into the furnace.
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace, quantity=5)  # Inserting 5 iron ore into the furnace.
print(f"Inventory updated to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Displaying updated inventory after insertion.
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Displaying the entities on the map related to the furnace.
